name: Dicey escapes?
description:
You play as Dicey and you escape a mysterious beast... a puzzle game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam by a small group of schoolmates.

Instructions:

wasd or arrow keys to move the goal for each level is to land on the yellow square with the correct dice face matching the number of bumps to open the door.

There are only 3 levels because that is all we had time to make, hope you enjoy!
